msContents.summary: Collection of tracts on varied subjects, including astronomy, the calendar, geomancy, magic and medicine.

msItem.title: Risālah fī istikhrāj al-tārīkh
رسالة في استخراج التاريخ
msItem.note: 'Tract on the Deduction of the Arabic from the Roman dates'. Pages have been ruled for a calendar, which has never been filled in.

msItem.title: Al-manqūl min kitāb ʿuyūn al-ḥaqā᾽iq wa-īḍāḥ al-ṭarā᾽iq
المنقول من كتاب عيون الحقايق وايضاح الطرايق
A page from a work on astronomy
msItem.note: Contains some instructions about the use of the quadrant.

author.persName: عبد الله بن محمد الجليلي الحنفي

msItem.title: Risālah ʿalá jadwal al-āfāqī li-aʿmāl al-layl wa-al-nahār
رسالة على جدول الافاقي لاعمال الليل والنهار
A list of books on medical science
Al-Manqūl min manẓūmat Mufaddal bin Mājidi al-ṭabīb
المنقول من منظومة مفضل بن ماجدي الطبيب
Recipe for making mucilaginous drinks.
msItem.note: From the same work as the preceeding.

msItem.title: A description of the physical appearance and character of AmirTimur,‏ d. 1336-1405.
msItem.note: Also contains a medical diagnosis of his constitution, an account of rememdies used by him for his ailments,and some verses byIbn Ḥijjah al-Ḥamawī, Taqī al-Dīn Abū Bakr ibn ʻAlī,‏ d. -1434

author.persName: Ḥillī, Ṣafī al-Dīn ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn Sarāyā, d. 1278
الحلي، صفي الدين عبد العزيز بن سرايا‏

msItem.title: Al-Muntakhab min dīwān al-fāḍil Ṣafī al-Dīn al-Ḥillī
المنتخب من ديوان الفاضل صفي الدين الحلي
An extract from the dīwān of al-Ḥillī.

author.persName: Jamāl al-Dīn Muḥammad bin Muḥammad al-Mārdīnī
جمال الدين محمد بن محمد المارديني

msItem.title: Al-Durr al-manthūr fī al-ʿamal bi-al-rubʿ al-dastūr
الدرّ المنثور في العمل بالربع الدستور
Fī maʿrifat ṣifāt al-kawākib al-manāzil
في معرفة صفات الكواكب المنازل
msItem.note: ِ A fragment of the work.

msItem.title: Some remarks on the time of the sun's rising.
msItem.note: Written on the title page of the preceeding work.

author.persName: Hasan bin Khalīl bin ʿAlī al-Ṭayyibī
حسن بن خليل بن علي الطيبي

msItem.title: Al-Nukāt al-zāhirat fī sharḥ al-waraqāt
النكات الزاهرات في شرح الورقات
msItem.note: Commentary onWaraqāt fī al-ʿamal bi-rubʿ al-muqanṭarātbyMāridīnī, ʻAbd Allāh ibn Khalīl,‏ ‎d. -1406, a treatise on the use of the Azimuth quadrant.

msItem.title: An abridgement of the introduction to the work commented on in the previous treatise.
Risālah majmūʿah min kalām al-mashāyīkh ʿalá al-rubʿ al-mujayyab
رسالة مجموعة من كلام المشايخ على الربع المجيب
A treatise on the rubʿ mujayyab, being an abstract of various works on the subject, in the form of question and answer.
A page on the Roman names of the months, with their Syrian equivalents.
msItem.note: Includes the times of the sun's rising, as well as that of the signs of the Zodiac, forming an ephemeris for the year 1594 AD.

msItem.title: An Arabic translation of an extract from the Persian work ʿAjā᾽ib al-Makhlūqāt byQazwīnī, Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad,‏ ‎c.a. 1203-1283

author.persName: Sibṭ al-Māridīnī, Badr al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad,‏ ‎d. 1423-
سبط المارديني، بدر الدين محمد بن محمد‏

msItem.title: Kifāyat al-qanūʿ fī al-ʿamal bi-al-rubʿ al-maqṭūʿ
كفاية القنوع في العمل بالربع المقطوع
msItem.note: A short treatise of fifteen chapters on the use of the graduated Azimuth quadrant.

msItem.title: On the divisions of the habitable world into zones
On the Roman months and the times of the risings of the sun and constellations
msItem.note: For the year 1552 AD.

author.persName: Ibn Shīth al-Qurashī, ʻAbd al-Raḥīm ibn ʻAlī,‏ ‎d. 1100-
ابن شيث القرشي، عبد الرحيم بن علي

msItem.title: Miftāḥ al-maqāṣid wa-miṣbāḥ al-marāṣid
مفتاح المقاصد ومصباح المراصد
msItem.note: A fragment of the work, containing a calculation of the age of the world.

msItem.title: Kitāb kashf al-rīyab fī al-ʿamal bi-al-rubʿ al-mujayyab
كتاب كشف الريب في العمل بربع المجيب
msItem.note: A treatise of twenty chapters and a khātimah on the use of the quadrant.

author.persName: Sibṭ al-Māridīnī, Badr al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad,‏ ‎d. 1423-
سبط المارديني، بدر الدين محمد بن محمد‏

msItem.title: Al-ṭuruq al-sinnīyah fī ḥisāb al-nisbah al-sīnīyah
الطرق السنية في حساب النسبة السينية
msItem.note: A short treatise in seven chapters, entitled "The royal road to the calculation of the ratios of the sines".

author.persName: Ibn al-Naqīb, Khalīl ibn Aḥmad,‏ ‎d. 1494 or 1495-1563 or 1564

msItem.title: Risālah fī al-jayb lil-Gharsī
رسالة في الجيب للغرسي
ِA tract on the sine
msItem.note: This is the first page of the following treatise, with many marginal notes and references written over it.

author.persName: Ibn al-Naqīb, Khalīl ibn Aḥmad,‏ ‎d. 1494 or 1495-1563 or 1564

msItem.title: Risālah fī ʿilm al-jayb
رسالة في علم الجيب
msItem.note: A treatise on the sine and the use of the mujayyab quadrant, explanatory of the work of the same name byQasṭallānī, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad,‏ ‎d. 1447 or 1448-1517 or 1518.

msItem.title: An Arabic translation of an extract from the Persian work ʿAjā᾽ib al-Makhlūqāt byQazwīnī, Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad,‏ ‎c.a. 1203-1283
A tract on the Roman months.
An extract on the origin of the winds, from the Persian work ʿAjā᾽ib al-Makhlūqāt byQazwīnī, Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad,‏ ‎c.a. 1203-1283
A fragment from a work on the graduated quadrant
A fragment on determining the time for evening prayer by the sine of the quadrant

author.persName: Abū ʿAbdallah Muḥammad ibn ʿAbd al-Raḥman al-Mizzī
أبو عبد الله ابن عبد الرحمن المزي

msItem.title: Kashf al-rīyab fī al-ʿamal bi-al-jayb
كشف الريب في العمل بالجيب
msItem.note: A treatise on the practical working with the sine of the quadrant, consisting of twenty-four chapters.

author.persName: Sibṭ al-Māridīnī, Badr al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad,‏ ‎d. 1423-
سبط المارديني، بدر الدين محمد بن محمد‏

msItem.title: Kitāb hidāyat al-ʿāmil bi-al-rubʿ al-kāmil
كتاب هداية العامل بالربع الكامل
msItem.note: A treatise on the use of the standard quadrant, in fourteen chapters.

msItem.title: Selections of poetry containing astonomical allusions.

author.persName: Muḥammad ibn Abī al-Fatḥ al-Ṣūfī al-Miṣrī, Abū ʿAbd Allah
محمد ابن أبي فتح الصوفي المصري، أبو عبد الله

msItem.title: Al-ʿAmal al-muṣaḥḥaḥ fī al-rubʿ al-mujannaḥ
العمل المصحح في الربع المجنح
msItem.note: Corrected work on the use of the mujannaḥ quadrant (used for the same purposes as the mujayyab quadrant).

author.persName: Sibṭ al-Māridīnī, Badr al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad,‏ ‎d. 1423-
سبط المارديني، بدر الدين محمد بن محمد‏

msItem.title: Risālah fī al-ʿamal bi-rubʿ al-muqanṭarāt
رسالة في العمل بربع المقنطرات
msItem.note: A treatise on the use of the Azimuth quadrant

msItem.title: Risālah fī al-ʿamal bi-al-rubʿ al-mujayyab
رسالة في العمل بالربع المجيب
msItem.note: A treatise on the mujayyab quadrant, consisting of a preface and twenty chapters.

author.persName: Muḥammad ibn Abī al-Fatḥ al-Ṣūfī al-Miṣrī, Abū ʿAbd Allah
محمد ابن أبي فتح الصوفي المصري، أبو عبد الله

msItem.title: Kitāb nihāyat al-rutbah fī al-ʿamal bi-jadwal al-nisbah
كتاب نهاية الرتبة في العمل بجدول النسبة
msItem.note: A treatise on the practical working with the table of the ratios of sines.

handNote.desc: Carefully written in an elegant taʿlīq hand

recordHist.source: "Manuscript description based on "E. G. Browne: A supplementary hand-list of the Muhammadan manuscripts, including all those written in the Arabic character, preserved in the Library of the University of Cambridge. Cambridge, 1922", and "E.H. Palmer A Descriptive Catalogue of the Arabic, Persian and Turkish Manuscripts in the Library of Trinity College, Cambridge, London 1870".

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card. (For admissions procedures contactWren Library Admissions). Contactwren.library@trin.cam.ac.ukfor further information on the availability of this manuscript.

revisionDesc.change: James Cummings Up-converted the markup using https://github.com/bodleian/fihrist-mss/tree/master/processing/convertFihrist2Bodley.xsl
